name: RaayClicker
description:
My first game, it's still pretty lacking in a lot of stuff since I just started working on it,

it's supposed to be a Minecraft themed cookie clicker game (Minecraft please don't sue me), where you gain cookies to upgrade your cookie clicking power, currently, there isn't much stuff to do in the game, so I'll appreciate it if you could send feedback about bugs and ideas to add to the game.

I hope you like the game, and please donate if you can since it helps me a lot. <3
